Christmas Dinner 2025 was a hit! 🎄 I made the prime rib roast, sliced and ready to eat 🍖, plus some ratatouille 🥘. Dad smoked a ham 🍖🔥, and my sister handled the mashed potatoes 🥔. We all enjoyed a fantastic meal 😋. This year, Mom decided to take it easy and sit back 🛋ï¸.
